description: A process saved the Security Account Manager SAM or SYSTEM hive to disk. If this is unexpected, it likely indicates credential theft. Investigate the process tree.

description: A process gathered identifying information about other network systems. Adversaries can use remote system information to attempt lateral movement. Review the process tree.
